info.name: WorkFlowy Background Images [Dark Theme]
info.description:
- This theme allows you to choose a custom background image for WorkFlowy and have it show through a dark, opaque text container. 
- This style goes nicely with this other one: https://userstyles.org/styles/158205/3-05-minimalist-template-a
- For a write-up, visit this WorkFlowy blog post: https://blog.workflowy.com/2016/05/12/background-images/
- See this style if you prefer a light theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/127784/workflowy-background-images-light-theme
